articles.title: Breakthrough Gene Therapy Shows Promise in Treating Huntington's Disease
articles.summary: A groundbreaking **UK** clinical trial led by Professor **Sarah Tabrizi** has demonstrated the first successful treatment of **Huntington's disease** using gene therapy. The surgical procedure significantly slowed the progression of this devastating neurological condition in **42** patients.

articles.title: White House Nears Historic Agreement to Preserve TikTok Operations
articles.summary: President **Trump** is expected to approve a landmark deal allowing **TikTok** to continue operating in the **United States** through a partnership with **Oracle**. The agreement addresses national security concerns while preserving access for millions of American users.

articles.title: Ukraine and Syria Restore Diplomatic Relations After Three-Year Break
articles.summary: **Ukraine** and **Syria** have officially resumed diplomatic ties during a meeting between leaders at the **United Nations General Assembly**. The restoration comes after Ukraine severed relations in **June 2022** when Syria recognized Russian-occupied territories as independent states.
